segments.text: In case you didn't know , I'm checking out in half an hour .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That won't be a problem , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good to hear . Now there's still a whole New York day ahead of me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right , sir . Your whole day is still ahead of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I still have time to explore more of New York , but I need a place to secure my baggage .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a storage place here , but you have to leave a deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A deposit , huh ? I would think my baggage would be enough of a deposit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just present your VISA card , and there won't be any problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That deposit bothers me . Give me a minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir , but remember how close it is to your checkout time .
segments.speaker: S2
